thread.title: Zach S
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Zach S

author: Zach S
title: Zach S
text: I live in Colorado and found out on Saturday that the usual smart start I go to was closed both Friday and Saturday due to upgrades..(including every other facility in Colorado) No notice via email or updated times via Google zilch! Bobbie did a excellent job giving me a unlock code to help with this inconvenience since my timer had run out. She was a very fun spirit to work with (quite possibly the 1st through smart start) and I would recommend her again and again for troubleshooting issues with the smart start program.
